data.eml:eml: Taxonomic resolution of the North American invasive species of the genus Bythotrephes Leydig, 1860 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Cercopagididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M., Arnott, Shelley E. (2019): Taxonomic resolution of the North American invasive species of the genus Bythotrephes Leydig, 1860 (Crustacea: Cladocera: Cercopagididae). Zootaxa 4691 (2): 125-138, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4691.2.2
